channel.title: CVE Feed for Eclipse Jetty -- Jetty
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eclipse Jetty -- Jetty

item.title: CVE-2024-9823|2024-10-15T17:49:38.804Z -- eclipse%20jetty -- jetty
item.description: There exists a security vulnerability in Jetty's DosFilter which can be exploited by unauthorized users to cause remote denial-of-service (DoS) attack on the server using DosFilter. By repeatedly sending crafted requests, attackers can trigger OutofMemory errors and exhaust the server's memory finally.

item.title: CVE-2024-9823|2024-10-14T15:29:14.390Z -- eclipse%20jetty -- jetty
item.description: There exists a security vulnerability in Jetty's DosFilter which can be exploited by unauthorized users to cause remote denial-of-service (DoS) attack on the server using DosFilter. By repeatedly sending crafted requests, attackers can trigger OutofMemory errors and exhaust the server's memory finally.
